Commands.Chainspell: 2-HIT BRV attack with low Action Delay.  Deals more damage when target is debuffed.
Commands.Lance of Atrophy: 2-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Inflicts Small Max BRV Down, Small Attack Down and Small Defense Down for 3 turns.  Deals more damage when target is debuffed.
Commands.Requiem: 3-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  BRV damage is spread among all targets.  HP damage is divided equally between all targets.  Moderately increases BRV damage to a single target.  Deals higher BRV damage to debuffed targets.

Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Chainspell Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Chainspell.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Lance of Atrophy Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Lance of Atrophy.
Passives.Chainspell Charge: Increases the max uses of Chainspell by 1.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Lance of Atrophy Charge: Increases the max uses of Lance of Atrophy by 1.
Passives.Blessing of Anima: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense when HP is under 50%.
Passives.Debuff Attack&Speed Up: Slightly raises Attack and Speed while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Chainspell Extend: Slightly raises Chainspell's potency.Triggers an HP attack if BRV is above 80% Max BRV.Inflicts Medium Initial BRV Down for 5 turns on the target.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 5 turns after using Chainspell.BRV Attack+ is a 1-HIT BRV attack that deals higher damage to a debuffed target.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Lance of Atrophy Extend: Moderately raises Lance of Atrophy's potency.Slightly improves the debuffs inflicted by the ability.Triggers Chainspell after using Lance of Atrophy if target's HP is under 50%.

Weapons.Summoner's Great Staff CP: 35: Increases Lance of Atrophy's potency.Extends the duration of all debuffs inflicted by Lance of Atrophy and increases their potency.
Weapons.Mortibody Staff CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Requiem.
Weapons.Seymour's Staff CP: 15: Increases Chainspell's potency and lowers its Action Delay.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 4 turns.
